title: Online Mathematics Competency Enhancement Program for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and experience applying mathematics to job-related tasks
context.additional_context: Professionals in healthcare, legal, and technical fields require optimized smartphone-based content due to high demand for applied mathematics in their duties.

learning_goals: Learners can perform application strategies using prior knowledge to solve math problems in job environments with 80% accuracy.
Learners can independently analyze complex math concepts by at least 70% using step-by-step guides (video/asynchronous feedback) provided by instructors.
Learners can form a social presence by maintaining interactions with peer learners at least twice a week through online discussion boards and collaborative assignments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
